entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Risk of a thundershower early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 12.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero except minus 5 in low lying areas.
